title: Patch 6.24 not showing download
body:
When I load my game up in the menu it still says "V6.23-3412078.3412263" not 6.4 patch.
Where do I do to manually update it?

replies.body: 6.24 is not currently live.  [Patch notes ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-624-notes)are available now, but may usually be posted in advance.  I don't have any additional information on when the next patch is, so hang tight!
